en.title: Computer Science and Technology
en.description: Completed a foundational preparatory program in computer science covering programming, algorithms, and data structures. Developed systematic problem-solving skills and gained substantial practical experience.
en.institution: Hunan University of Arts and Science

zh.title: 计算机科学与技术
zh.description: 完成计算机科学基础预科课程，涵盖编程、算法与数据结构，掌握系统性的问题解决方法，积累了丰富的实践经验。
